name: Project 1996
description:
Project 1996 is a short and unfinished bullet-hell game where you have to shoot or hit a ball to kill enemies. The gameplay is based on the first Touhou game. The game is coded in Java with LWJGL 3. Everything in this game is currently developed by only one person.

As the game is now it only contains a few rounds of enemies, and a bossfight. There is no storyline in this yet.

If someone is interested in this game and it's development, feel free to join the game's Discord-server: https://discord.gg/T7bp4Vy

Link to the soundtrack: https://soundcloud.com/new-hammer/project-1996-ost...

All feedback on this project is highly appreciated!

Thank you for taking your time to read the project-description <3
